response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, and I am confident it will bring the same level of satisfaction to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase it for $12,000. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a premium rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 12000}
